thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Jakks Pacific Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $1.57

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Jakks Pacific Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $1.57
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - JAKKS Pacific Inc:
* JAKKS PACIFIC REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 SALES $93 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $88.2 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.67 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 HURT BY LIQUIDATION OF TOYS R US AND HIGHER ROYALTIES RESULTING FROM A SHIFT IN PRODUCT MIX
* FOR FY 2018 OUTLOOK SEES SOME MARKET DISRUPTION IN U.S. AND INTERNATIONALLY RELATED TO TOYS R US BANKRUPTCY
* EXPECTS FY 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS TO IMPROVE OVERALL WHEN COMPARED TO 2017
* Q1 2018 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.85 * JAKKS PACIFIC - SPECIAL COMMITTEE CONTINUES TO EVALUATE MEISHENG’S EXPRESSION OF INTEREST TO BRING ITS HOLDING TO 51% OF CO’S SHARES Source text for Eikon:
